LogRecord class

LogRecord value objects are used to pass logging requests between the logging framework and individual publishers.

Author

Ralf Siegel

The LogRecord class inherits from the Object class.

Constructor for the LogRecord class

ConstructorDescription
LogRecord()Construct a LogRecord with the given date, source's logger name, level and message values.

Method summary for the LogRecord class

MethodDescription
LogRecord.getDate()Get the event date.
LogRecord.getLevel()Get the logging message level, for example Level.SEVERE.
LogRecord.getLoggerName()Get the source's logger name
LogRecord.getMessage()Get the "raw" log message before formatting.
